value.string_value: Encouraging innovation and the rapid adoption of digital technologies can enable China to avoid middle-income trap

legacy.description: Read China, daily on your smartphone.
legacy.name: China Daily app

legacy.full_text:
In the 1st decade of the 21st century, the West took the world to the brink of economic collapse, while China enabled the West to recover from its self-inflicted injuries. China's policies provide structural solutions for escaping the middle-income trap.
https://t.co/k4LuwJD7ef

value.string_value: It has been widely reported in recent weeks that the United States is preparing to launch what has been described as "the Indo-Pacific Economic Framework" a slogan which will apparently claim to...

legacy.description: Read China, daily on your smartphone.

legacy.full_text:
The #IPEF is bound to be a non-starter. The #US attemps to dictate the economic rules to a region it is not geographically part of, and is asking countries to take a contrary position to the largest regional player -- China. This makes no sense. 
https://t.co/da2guqmII3

value.string_value: Helping farmers plant is the way to feed more hungry people for less money

legacy.description: Read China, daily on your smartphone.
legacy.name: China Daily app

legacy.full_text:
.@FAO estimates that for just $1.5 billion, we can provide immediate life and livelihood-saving agricultural assistance to about 50 million people, enabling them to produce food right where it is needed most. @reinpaulsen 
https://t.co/z2dibVQeKI

legacy.description: China Daily-powered think tank, connecting China-focused thinkers around the world, providing thought-provoking research on China-related issues

legacy.full_text: It doesn't take much to relieve people from hunger by helping them plant, at a time when #COVID19 and #UkraineRussiaConflict disrupt global food supply: A 20-kilo sack of wheat seeds, an hour of a hired tractor's time, delivered at the right moment will do. @reinpaulsen https://t.co/Zuv95H6GeB

value.string_value: Wetlands are among the most productive ecosystems in the world. They provide critical functions such as coastal flood defenses, addressing climate change, acting as a habitat for biodiversity, and...

legacy.full_text:
